name: The Jester and The Beardoor
description:
A short puzzle game telling a story about a certain darkness.  When the Jester sleeps in the tavern with the Beardoor, strange things start to emerge. Solve each dream and find out about the 'darkness'.

Made in the HKU Game Jam in 2020, themed 'A Bedtime Story'.

Art by: Nicole Verberne, Justin Stolk, Dion Peek & Wido Beukhof. 

Design by: Wido Beukhof  & Felix Warburg.

Programmed by: Tom Renkema.
